text: December 12, 2018 - Zayn releases the track'There You Are'an intense love song about relying on people that fans definitely think is about Gigi Hadid. Lyrics include, ` ` Friends that I rely on / Don't come through / They run like the river / But not you. ` ` Only you know me the way you know me / Only you forgive me when I'm sorry / Even when I messed it up / There you are.''
